revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Netgear WNDR4700 CENTRIA |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.netgear.com/wndr4700 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = WNDR4700 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (CENTRIA) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 07/09/2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Netgear_WNDR4700 |wlclass = AN900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY311400179 |icid = 4054A-11400179 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Applied Micro;APM82181; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = PowerPC |cpu1_type_rev = 464 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27U1G8F2BTR; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU64M16GG-AC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327N; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 20:E5:2A |oui = 20:E5:2A
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2009.08;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.32.11;OpenWrt-deriv;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, SATA, SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = fan, DFS |addchip = USB3.0 Host Controller;Renasas;D720202;;1; ,,, PCIe Expansion Switch;IDT;89HPES4T4;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = NETGEARXX, NETGEARXX-5G |defaultssid_regex = ^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$,,, ^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}-5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/13/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 606449082944 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0092ML8QW |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9381; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9380; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This FCC ID covers two devices... * WNDR4700 - no hard drive included * WNDR4720 - 2.0 TB hard drive included
Per the FCC docs.. * "2976387504" is silkscreened on the board. * The CPU is part APM82181-SKE1000T ([http://www.apm.com/products/embedded/singlecore460/apm82181/ ''Applied Micro'' APM82181 PPage]). * There is an ''IDT'' PCIe switch (89HPES4T4) on-board. *It is shown with three possible HDD brands, one ''Seagate'', one ''Toshiba'', and one ''Western Digital'' - each 2.0TB in size. ** The HDD is only included w/ the [[Netgear_WNDR4720|WNDR4720]], the [[Netgear_WNDR4700|WNDR4700]] is sold diskless
{{WiFiCert|WFA18814|03/18/2013}}
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://vr-zone.com/articles/netgear-wndr4700-centria-review/19209.html 'Netgear WNDR4700'' on '''VR-Zone'''] (w/ internal images and chip P/Ns) :Per the VR-Zone review, the device is using... :*''Applied Micro'' APM82181 @1GHz PowerPC SoC :*[[Atheros]] AR9381 for the 2.4GHz radio :*[[Atheros]] AR9380 for the 5GHz radio :*''Renasas'' (prev. ''NEC'') D720202 USB 3.0 host controller :*[[Atheros]] AR8327N for the GbE Switch *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31882-first-look-netgear-wndr4700-centria ''First look Netgear WNDR4700'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''], [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31894-netgear-wndr4700-centria-reviewed ''Netgear WNDR4700'' review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/154-netgear-wndr4700.html ''Netgear WNDR4700'' review on '''FoxNetwork'''] (RU) *[http://www.foxnetlab.com/index.php/16-reviews/96-netgear-wndr4700 ''Netgear WNDR4700'' review on '''FoxNetLab'''] (EN) *[http://www.myopenrouter.com/article/42638/Review-of-NETGEAR-s-Centria-WNDR4700-WNDR4720-All-In-One-Wireless-Router/ ''Netgear WNDR4700'' Review on '''MyOpenRouter'''] *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/netgear-wndr4700.shtml ''Netgear WNDR4700'' Review on '''iXBT'''] (RU)
===Wikis=== {{OpenWrtTechData|https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_wndr4700_v1}} {{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wndr4700}} :"2976387505" is silkscreened on the board. :20:E5:2A OUIs, '''NETGEARXX''' and '''NETGEARXX-5G''' :(numeric '''XX''') default SSID patterns :PCI IDs include... :4x 111d:803a (''IDT'' PES4T4), 168c:0030 (AR938xx), 168c:0033 (AR958x), 1912:0015 (''Renasas'' µpd720202) indicating that one each of AR938x and AR958x series WiFi chips are being used with at least this particular device ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=45592 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:57581 On '''iXBT''' forums] *[https://forum.lede-project.org/ On the '''LEDE''' forums]
===Other=== *[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gp_BkF3HGw4 First look on '''C|Net''''s YouTube channel]
